description: There's nothing like a whole roasted barramundi to impress your guests. Treat your Christmas gathering to flaky barramundi baked with lemon and harissa.
name: Whole Roasted Barramundi With Lemon & Harissa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.25 bunch mint, sprigs picked, stems reserved
0.25 bunch continental parsley, sprigs picked, stems reserved
1 long red chilli, thinly sliced diagonally

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Zest and juice 1 lemon. Combine harissa, zest, honey, garlic and half each of the oil and lemon juice in a small bowl.

Thinly slice remaining lemon. Score both sides of fish at 3cm intervals. Rub harissa mixture over skin and into cuts. Place half of the lemon slices and reserved herb stems in fish cavity. Place on tray, then top with remaining lemon slices. Bake for 20 minutes or until fish is cooked through and flakes easily.
Place chilli, herb sprigs, and remaining lemon juice and oil in a small bowl and toss to coat. Serve fish topped with herb salad.
